name: HP
desc: Hit points. The unit is removed from the battle if HP reaches 0.

name: Pow
desc: Power. The higher the number, the more damage you inflict.

name: Spd
desc: Speed. Each point gives 2 Avoid. If 4 or more than opponent, trigger a follow-up attack.

name: Lck
desc: Luck. Every point gives 5 Crit Avoid.

name: Def
desc: Defense. Reduces damage from physical weapons.

name: Res
desc: Resistance: Lowers the potency of incoming spells.

name: Tec
desc: Technique. Every point gives 5 Critical Chance.

name: Con
desc: Constitution. Affects how well the unit can wield heavier weapons.

name: Mov
desc: Movement. The distance you can move in one turn.
